Kitsune are 

Ability Adjustments+2 Dex, +2 Cha, -2 Str

Hit Points 4

Size and Type

Kitsune are Medium humanoids with the kitune and shapechanger subtypes.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.9JZ2SBxqglvGvC6d]{Agile}

Kitsune gain a +2 species bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.3QdtsfnVJsHEdrt0]{Acrobatics} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.iLlBAZBfHJMZQRQx]{Athletics} checks.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.rNLLU3ENzE0yrsfn]{Change Shape}

As a standard action, a kitsune can assume the appearance of a specific single Medium humanoid. The kitsune always takes this specific form when using this ability. The kitsune gains a +10 species bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.aayAhTaRzitONs5U]{Disguise}checks to appear as that type of humanoid. This ability otherwise functions as disguise self, except that the kitsune can remain in this form indefinitely.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.bEz0QahJxLnQYplx]{Kitsune Magic}

Kitsune gain the following spell-like abilities (see page 262): 3/dayâ€”@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.rSWg5JnN3mxzkatD]{Dancing Lights}, At will-@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.kNURbWD9d5768exU]{Token Spell}. The caster level for these effects is equal to the Kitsune's character level.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.ivfqMdylivscbLak]{Low-Light Vision}

Kitsune have low-light vision.
